item.description:
Our first Meetup of 2010 was cancelled due to bad weather. So here's a chance for some of us to get together for a few hours of hands-on crafting at ArtStudio 360 in Holliston.

I suggest using the time to work on cards for February swaps -- or the postponed January swaps, if you missed them -- or the March swaps if you're working waaaaaaaay ahead. But, really, you're welcome bring and work on any projects you like.

Arrive anytime after 1 p.m. We'll go 'til about 6 p.m. We offer free parking, table space, a kitchenette, restrooms, spring water and shared supplies.

The usual Open Studio fee is $5 per person, but if you can throw in a bit more to help defray the group's costs, that would be great.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Last-Minute Meetup Makeup Session--Make Some Cards at ArtStudio 360
